attributes.action: force the BBC to screen The Beatle's 'Let It Be' film on terrestrial TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let It Be hasn't been seen on British screens since about 1978. As The Beatles are an important part of the UK's cultural history and Let It Be charts an important part of the history of the band, more access to this film is required. Afterall, the kids of today are already starting to ask: "Dad, who are these Beatles?:

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
